metadata.title: Bering and Chukchi Sea Bathymetry

creators.name: U. S. Geological Survey (USGS), Alaska Biological Science Center, Marine

metadata.description: Bathymetric contours of the Bering and Chukchi Seas at 1:2,500,00 scale. Digitized from two USGS maps: "Bathymetric Map of the Chukchi Sea" (OFR 76-823, 1976) and "Bathymetric Map of the Aleutian Trench and Bering Sea" (OFR-76-821, 1976).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: This coverage was created to support marine mammal and bird research at the Alaska Biological Science Center.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
